chat.ejb.service

Interface AccountService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountServiceImpl

    public interface AccountService
    This interface provides functionality associated with user account data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean activateAccount(java.lang.String registrationCode)
      This method locates the appropriate account using the given registration code and activates the account.
      boolean activateAccountByUsername(java.lang.String username)
      This method locates the appropriate account using the given username and activates the account.
      boolean deactivateAccountByUsername(java.lang.String username)
      This method locates the appropriate account using the given username and deactivates the account.
      boolean emailAddressPreviouslyStored(java.lang.String emailAddress)
      This method searches for accounts which already have the given email address.
      boolean findActivationStatusByRegistrationCode(java.lang.String registrationCode)
      This method uses the entity manager to retrieve the activation status of the user with the given registration code.
      boolean findActivationStatusByUsername(java.lang.String username)
      This method uses the entity manager to retrieve the activation status of the user with the given username.
      java.lang.String generateUsername(java.lang.String firstName)
      This method generates a username for a new user.

        Returns:
        the new username

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the activation status

      • emailAddressPreviouslyStored

        boolean emailAddressPreviouslyStored(java.lang.String emailAddress)
        This method searches for accounts which already have the given email address.
        Parameters:
        emailAddress - the email address
        Returns:
        true if an account is found for the given email address, false otherwise

        This method locates the appropriate account using the given registration code and activates the account.
        Parameters:
        registrationCode - the registration code
        Returns:
        the indication of operation success or failure
